ci_image = np.array([[10.0, 11.0, 18.0], [13.0, 8.0, 18.0], [16.0, 5.0, 18.0]])
mask = np.array([[True, True, True], [False, True, True], [False, True, False]]
    )
pattern = ci_pattern.CIPatternNonUniform(normalization=10.0, regions=[(0, 3,
    0, 3)], row_slope=0.0)
with pytest.raises(exc.CIPatternException):
    pattern.ci_pre_cti_from_ci_image_and_mask(ci_image=ci_image, mask=mask)
